message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $140.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $135.
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $145. This is my final offer.
